titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306 Records WAG.290

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-07-17T11:11-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306 Records

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: AFSCME. Local 1306 (American Museum of Natural History) (New York, N.Y.).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Reggie Qadar, president of Local 1306, sent a gift of the union's records in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 1979.003.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306 Records; WAG 209; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This very small collection contains some records of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), DC 37, Local 1306, which represented workers in the American Museum of Natural History. The collection contains correspondence, collective bargaining documents, grievances, and minutes of the local.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306 are held by Local 1306. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which the union holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Local 1306.
